item.title: Power Finance Corporation Ltd Gains 2.31%: Valuation and Technical Shifts Drive Market Interest
item.description: Power Finance Corporation Ltd (PFC) recorded a 2.31% gain over the week ending 20 February 2026, outperforming the Sensex which rose 0.39% in the same period. The stock showed strong early-week momentum with consecutive daily gains before retreating midweek amid mixed technical signals and valuation shifts. This review analyses the key events and market dynamics that shaped PFC’s price action during the week. Time: 47 minutes ago

item.title: Repco Home Finance Declines 3.61%: Technical Shifts and Mixed Financial Signals Shape the Week
item.description: Repco Home Finance Ltd’s stock declined by 3.61% over the week ending 20 February 2026, closing at ₹390.10 from ₹404.70, while the Sensex gained 0.39% in the same period. The week was marked by a technical downgrade early on, a brief recovery in momentum midweek, and a subsequent upgrade to Hold on improved technicals and valuation. These developments, combined with mixed financial signals and fluctuating market sentiment, shaped the stock’s volatile performance. Time: 48 minutes ago

item.title: Patanjali Foods Gains 2.54%: 4 Key Factors Driving This Week’s Mixed Momentum

item.title: Elecon Engineering Falls 2.50%: Valuation Shift and Mixed Financials Shape Weekly Trend
item.description: Elecon Engineering Company Ltd experienced a challenging week on the bourses, with its share price declining by 2.50% from Rs.434.45 to Rs.423.60 between 16 and 20 February 2026. item.title: Sadhana Nitro Chem Ltd Plunges 68.70%: 5 Key Events Shaping the Week
